column5: I'm new here and many of you may already be aware of this resource, but I'll post it anyways because I find it really useful.  http://www.anglersatlas.com/  You have to sign up, but once you do there are free lake information/fishing maps for lakes all over Canada and the U.S.  Cheers,  Josh
yeah they have some decent locations for sure i use it a few times a year  cheers!
